metadata.description:
QUBIT-TLS SWAP SPECTROSCOPY
This program consists of exciting the qubit with an xy pi pulse and then tuning the resonant frequency
with a Z pulse of varying amplitude and duration. Lastly, the qubit population is read out upon the Z
pulse ending. The resulting chevron patterns correspond to vacuum Rabi oscilations between the qubit and
strongly coupled TLSs in its vicinity.

Prerequisites:
    - Having found the resonance frequency of the resonator coupled to the qubit under
      study (resonator_spectroscopy).
    - Having calibrated qubit pi pulse (x180) by running qubit, spectroscopy,
      rabi_chevron, power_rabi and updated the state.
    - (optional) Having calibrated the readout (readout_frequency, amplitude,
      duration_optimization IQ_blobs) for better SNR.
metadata.name: 12_qubit_TLS_swap_spectroscopy

qubits.description: A list of qubit names which should participate in the execution of the node. Default is None.
qubits.title: Qubits

multiplexed.description:
Whether to play control pulses, readout pulses and active/thermal reset at the same time for all qubits (True)
or to play the experiment sequentially for each qubit (False). Default is False.
multiplexed.title: Multiplexed

use_state_discrimination.description:
Whether to use on-the-fly state discrimination and return the qubit 'state', or simply return the demodulated
quadratures 'I' and 'Q'. Default is False.
use_state_discrimination.title: Use State Discrimination

reset_type.description:
The qubit reset method to use. Must be implemented as a method of Quam.qubit. Can be "thermal", "active", or
"active_gef". Default is "thermal".
reset_type.title: Reset Type

num_shots.description: Number of averages to perform. Default is 100.
num_shots.title: Num Shots

frequency_detuning_in_mhz.description: Frequency detuning in MHz. Default is 1.0 MHz.
frequency_detuning_in_mhz.title: Frequency Detuning In Mhz

min_z_duration_in_ns.description: Minimum Z SWAP duration in nanoseconds. Default is 16.
min_z_duration_in_ns.title: Min Z Duration In Ns

max_z_duration_in_ns.description: Maximum Z SWAP duration in nanoseconds. Default is 5000.
max_z_duration_in_ns.title: Max Z Duration In Ns

z_duration_step_in_ns.description: Step size for the Z SWAP pulse duration in nanoseconds. Default is 60.
z_duration_step_in_ns.title: Z Duration Step In Ns

flux_span.description: Span of flux values to sweep in volts. Default is 0.01 V.
flux_span.title: Flux Span

flux_num.description: Number of flux points to sample. Default is 21.
flux_num.title: Flux Num

min_tls_amp.description: minimum amplitude of vacuum Rabi oscillations to consider in fitting.
min_tls_amp.title: Min Tls Amp

simulate.description: Simulate the waveforms on the OPX instead of executing the program. Default is False.
simulate.title: Simulate

simulation_duration_ns.description: Duration over which the simulation will collect samples (in nanoseconds). Default is 50_000 ns.
simulation_duration_ns.title: Simulation Duration Ns

use_waveform_report.description: Whether to use the interactive waveform report in simulation. Default is True.
use_waveform_report.title: Use Waveform Report

timeout.description: Waiting time for the OPX resources to become available before giving up (in seconds). Default is 120 s.
timeout.title: Timeout

load_data_id.description: Optional QUAlibrate node run index for loading historical data. Default is None.
load_data_id.title: Load Data Id
